subs.text: If you have comments or questions about "Likes", here's a place to post them. I'm interested in knowing what you think.

The Democrats have never responded to this statement by Reagan. "In this present crisis, government is not the solution to our problem, government is the problem." Since then the Repubs have been running the table. Reagan may have been sincere, but his successors have been using this as an excuse to loot the treasury.

Lakoff: "Previous generations had the benefit of a robust public education system. Education was affordable or free. We invested in the American people, and the result was a powerful and free nation."
Thejeshgn wrote API docs for his experiments with my "Likes" API.

I've finished season 1 of The Sinner on Netflix. Loved it. All the characters are interesting, the story keeps unfolding in interesting ways, the acting is superb, you really get involved in the story. Now starting season 2 on Amazon, for $15. So far it's just as good as the first. :rocket:

I've been fighting a cold this week so haven't been posting much. The cold is receding I hope and I hope to be back up to speed in a day or two. If you want to wish me a speedy recovery you can Like this post. :boom:
